The nature of Christianity in the true light asserted in opposition to antichristianism, darkness, confusion, & sin-pleasing doctrines : being a looking glass for sin-pleasing professors of all sorts / written upon particular occasion herein signified, by a servant of Christ, G. Whitehead. Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
74, [1] p.
s.n.], [London : 1671.
Place of publication suggested by Wing. "An aditional postscript by George Keith to Robert Gordon"--p. 60-69. Imperfect: stained, with print show-through. Errata : p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
